text: Brachyotum confertum is a species of plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador confertum Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxa named by Aimé Bonpland Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Brachyotum confertum
